lines.text: Listen baby,
lines.translation: 聽著 寶貝，

lines.text: Ain't no mountain high enough,
lines.translation: 沒有哪座山高得不可逾越，

lines.text: Ain't no valley low enough,
lines.translation: 沒有哪個深谷深不可測，

lines.text: Ain't no river wide enough,
lines.translation: 沒有哪條大河寬得跨不過去，

lines.text: To keep me from getting to you baby.
lines.translation: 能阻擋我來到你身邊，寶貝。

lines.text: Remember the day I set you free,
lines.translation: 記得我讓你自由的那天嗎，

lines.text: I told you you could always count on me darling.
lines.translation: 我告訴過你，親愛的，你可以永遠依靠我。

lines.text: From that day on, I made a vow,
lines.translation: 從那天起，我許下了誓言，

lines.text: I'll be there when you want me, some way, somehow.
lines.translation: 只要你感召，無論在哪，無論如何，我都會出現。

lines.text: 'Cause baby, there ain't no mountain high enough,
lines.translation: 因為寶貝，沒有哪座山高得不可逾越，

lines.text: Ain't no valley low enough,
lines.translation: 沒有哪個深谷深不可測，

lines.text: Ain't no river wide enough,
lines.translation: 沒有哪條大河寬得跨不過去，

lines.text: To keep me from getting to you baby.
lines.translation: 能阻擋我來到你身邊，寶貝。

lines.text: Oh no darling, no wind, no rain,
lines.translation: 哦不，親愛的，狂風大雨也擋不住我，

lines.text: Or winters cold can stop me baby, na na baby.
lines.translation: 嚴冬寒冷也無法阻擋我，寶貝，喔 寶貝。

lines.text: 'Cause you are my goal,
lines.translation: 因為你就是我的目標，

lines.text: If you're ever in trouble, I'll be there on the double.
lines.translation: 如果你身陷困境，我會第一時間趕到。

lines.text: Just send for me, oh baby, ha!
lines.translation: 只要呼喚我就好，哦 寶貝，哈！

lines.text: My love is alive, deep down in my heart,
lines.translation: 我的愛一直鮮活地存在於內心深處，

lines.text: Even though we are miles apart.
lines.translation: 即使我們相距萬里。

lines.text: If you ever need a helping hand,
lines.translation: 如果你曾需要幫助，

lines.text: I'll be there on the double, just as fast as I can.
lines.translation: 我會第一時間趕到，以最快的速度。
